name: SubmarineCraft
description:
SubmarineCraft is a game of freely building ships or submarines to explore the ocean.

The game offers dozens of blocks to build your submarine in your mind to fight against enemy ships. Each block has its own physical characteristics.

There is no blood strip in the game, instead of real-time physical simulation. The buoyancy of the submarine is also determined by the amount of gas in the submarine.

The game also provides a free construction mode, players can not only build submarines, but also try to build thermal power plants, heat engines and so on!

[game features]

1. The quality of submarine depends on your design!

2. Game system to meet the energy conservation, need players to master heat, pressure and other factors, physical simulation favorite!

3. Floating and submerging depend on the amount of water in the ballast tank.
